评论详情: I recently purchased a pair of shorts that have quickly become a favorite in my wardrobe. These shorts are not only stylish, but they are incredibly comfortable to wear. The fabric is soft and lightweight, making them perfect for everyday wear or for a casual outing.  The fit of the shorts is just right, not too tight or too loose, and the length is perfect for my preference. The material is of high quality and feels durable, these shorts will last me for a long time.  I have received numerous compliments when wearing these shorts, and I find myself reaching for them time and time again. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish option for summer or casual wear. Overall, I rate these shorts as very good and extremely comfortable – a must-have for anyone's wardrobe.
Extremely comfortable- I got a size small and it was true to size. So cute and flattering. Not see through either which is good

评论概述: Cute flowy & trendy, but color fades
评论详情: These are one of my favorite and most worn summer shorts! These are definitely the pickleball style shorts I was looking for. The v shaped waist band is very flattering and does have some compression which I need as a mom of multiple kids! The shorts underneath are perfect for comfort and movement, they do hit right on your very upper thigh where volleyball shorts would. Another plus is that they have pockets for your phone!! The shorts have a cute flow to them when you walk and move. These are so cute. **Update several months later: when I washed these the color almost completely faded (in picture) they were light pink and now they’re more of an off-white, maybe I would have more luck with another color. I still wear them and love how cute and flowy they are, despite the fading color they are honestly so comfortable to wear in hot weather so I continue to wear these.  **Another update: I bought these in brown and have washed them several times, the brown holds up much better and the color has not faded. I might go back for black, I truly love these.

These were literally a staple for my summer 2024. I bought them in 3 different colors and I can’t wait for spring/summer 2025 to get here so I can wear them again!  They are super soft and since they’re the spandex material, they can pick easily on things, but I love the quality. I love that it has a hidden pocket too!
So glad I got these. I’m 5’4 and they are the perfect length not to short. They are so comfortable will definitely be buying more. They are true to size.

Cute but they are not a thick girls best buddy- the moment I start walking in these they ride all the way up my legs and aren't even a skirt anymore but just really tight shorts. They have pockets which is always a plus for any girls bottom's, but these pockets are under the skirt area so to use them you have to lift that up and lowkey flash everyone. They are comfortable and good for casual wear or athletic wear, but beware- the waistband will move and stay down so if you're looking for a waistband that stays then this isn't it.

I bought these as workout shorts but also wear them casually. I love them so much. They have spandex underneath which make me feel secure. The material is nice quality lightweight and athletic. The flowy shorts almost look like a skirt which I love. Would for sure recommend buying.  Only note: they wrinkle in my drawer when folded and are better to keep on a hanger in the closet.

These Crossover Athletic Shorts are great for any occasion, both workouts and casual wear. They're super comfortable and provide great freedom of movement, making them perfect for everything from running to yoga. I was in a car accident and these were perfect for all my chiropractor appointments and feel super soft of my injured low back. The material is lightweight and breathable, which helps keep me cool during workouts. They also have a convenient pocket for my essentials. The downsides are that they can ride up a bit during high-intensity activities, and they have a weird fold along the waistband, but overall, they're a fantastic pair of shorts that combine style and functionality.

my daughter got these and they are so cute, flowy and good coverage.  the V front is flattering with a cropped top, she had an inspiration off of Pinterest and these shorts were exactly the look she was wanting.

评论概述: Super cute and fits really well
评论详情: I love these! It's a bit too pricey imo, but they do fit really well and the material is comfy to wear. They work great for running or yoga. I wear petite size and the XS fit me perfectly!
They're super comfortable, flattering and breathable. The pocket is convenient. I only wish it came with a pocket on both sides.
In summer it is one of my essentials. They are comfortable and look great.
idk what material this was but it is soooo soft ! i love them, but i would size down if in between sizes. i will warn you these do ride up if you have big thighs.

I like these shorts. They have the typical work out material. They are really breathable. I wore them around universal all day and had no problems. For some reason I thought it was a shirt, with shorts underneath, but it is not. They do bunch up in the front area, which looked odd, but other than that they are nice.
Quality is supper soft, cute for walks
Really pretty and comfy. I wore them over my swimsuit to brunch then hit the pool with the. I got compliments on them too. Definitely buying in other colors
I love these so much! In all the colors, very flattering, so soft and perfect for working out especially in Florida!
Perfect fit and super comfortable

Let me tell you… THESE SHORTS!!! They are beyond comfortable and super lightweight I forgot I was wearing them at points!! They’re super flattering and the colors are even prettier in person. I ordered 4 pairs (purple, light blue, white, brown) and I fear I will be ordering the rest. The undershorts did ride up on me, but not as bad as other shorts. For me, it was very manageable and worth it for the price and comfort. My biggest concern in Florida heat is chaffing, and in these shorts I was safe!! 10/10 product, I highly recommend.
These were soft and good quality, however they do run small, size up.
I really like my shorts. They are so comfortable and fit just like I wanted them to. Will definitely buy more
it's an excellent choice for tennis playing teenagers. Good quality, good price, I bought different colors.

Firstly, I LOVE the material of these.  It feels like silky/butter on your skin.  The skort is cute but not for my body type. I have large hips and a good size caboose and i felt like these made them even bigger and it just wasn't flattering to me. Now, I know I am about 30 pounds over weight (5'4" 160 lb), so I don't necessarily blame the product, just wanted to let others know. I also want to point out, these are SKORTS, meaning that there is a separation in the middle.  I initially thought this was a skirt with shorts underneath. Again, it was my mistake, not the product. For me the skort factor added an unflattering look.I think these would look adorable on a slimmer build and I'm definitely gonna look for other options by the manufacturer, because I love the lightweight material and color.For reference, I bought a large and it fit well.
These are the most comfortable shorts. I love the fit and material. I worried about them being too small, but they fit perfectly. Can’t wait for summer to wear them more.

These are very comfortable and I received a lot of compliments on them. I am 5’2, with between 130-135, ordered a medium and they fit great. I am very short wasted, so the waste tended to curl over if I didn’t have them pulled up high enough. This could just happen to me since I barely have much of a waste. The material is nice, comfortable and medium weight.
Got these for my teenage daughter. She wears them for everything, from working out to going out.

评论概述: Didn’t look great on my thighs, but excellent quality
评论详情: These are great quality, really nice thickness, and not see through. I really want to love them, but I have thicker thighs and a big butt, and these accentuated that a lot. The outer thigh area gets raised up because of the fuller parts of my hips and thigh and made them an odd shape like an upside down triangle and it made my legs look really big :(

I got this for working out this summer and it was great! It wasn’t see through at all and had a decent sized inside pocket for my phone. I usually wear a size L or 14 in pants and this fit great!  I didn’t realize until after I bought it that I was pregnant and it even held up for most of my first trimester! So it’s super functional even in early pregnancy lol!
Super comfy and cute.
These are super soft and true to size

i have been on the hunt for a pair of flowy shorts for the summer that won’t show off my secrets to the world 🫣 these are PERF. h: 5’2 w: 190lbs i have large hips, and a SLIGHTLY smaller waist. i’ve got some junk in the trunk and thighs that take up an entire seat when i sit. the spandex on the inside isn’t constricting, and it’s very soft. and the criss cross waistband is very flattering on my stomach and hips. the flowy part has an athletic feel, but isn’t aggressively shiny (if that makes sense), and it’s still flowy despite my thighs!! i was worried these shorts were gonna make me look huge in awkward spots—but with the waistband and gentle flow, it is super flattering! not to mention…who doesn’t love a secret little pocket?

评论概述: There’s only a pocket on right side
评论详情: If your right handed playing tennis it can be inconvenient to have the pocket on the same side you hold your racket. I will defiantly have to replace it for game days but over all it is really nice quality, fits true to size. And looks cute. My daughter loves it, except for the pocket. Great for lefty
These are so soft and comfortable, the only thing I’d say is the under shorts are quite a bit longer than the top layer and they can look..interesting.

The color of these shorts were right on from their pictures! They don’t fade. I’ve had mine for over a year now and I love them! They don’t wrinkle so I don’t have to worry about it looking bad. They don’t roll up they stay in place. I have a small waist and bigger thighs and I struggle to find shorts that fit well at the waist and the legs and these are amazing. They compliment my body type while giving me a hour glass with the crossing. The only thing I don’t like about the pockets is there’s only one on the right side , so if you like to put things in both sides of your pockets that would be a problem.  I highly recommend these shorts especially if you do running sports or marching band like me. Bending down or marching I’m always scared my shorts would be to short but I feel way better that there are shorts underneath the other ones .

Perfect combination of comfort and style.  The fabric is incredibly soft and lightweight. The waistband is really stretchy and the v-cut design keeps you from getting muffin tip. I also really like the flow-y short style, it gives them the appearance of a skirt making it slightly more dressy than other athletic shorts. I haven't tried to wear them during any intense workouts but they are one of my favorites for dog walks, The built in shorts prevent your thighs rubbing together.  Overall, if you’re in the market for athletic shorts that are both cute and incredibly comfortable, I highly recommend these. They’ve quickly become a staple in my activewear collection

These are a great fit, I’m 5’3” 145lbs, curvy fit, bought a M, am ordering another pair in S bc I feel like they can be more fitted on my waist, but still keeping these. The cut is what makes them so flattering. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 bc the material feels a little on the cheaper side, but if you keep in mind that they were $15, it’s pretty good quality for the price. I also wish they had 2 pockets on the inner shorts instead of just the 1 but overall I recommend these shorts

评论概述: So comfortable and love the fit
评论详情: So comfortable and love the fit and flare! I love that they have pockets!

Upon opening the package, aside from the wrinkles which can't be helped, I was a little worried about the length. I gave it 4 stars because it looks longer in the picture, but after trying them on, they are longer than they look. Fits true to size, comfy, and love the flattering crossover waist detail. Material is very stretchy and soft. They have a phone pocket on the right side, but also minus a star because there is only one pocket 🙄 they are flattering and comfy though, so all in all good shorts. I'm excited to use them!
So soft and great for a run. The only problem I had is when I put my phone in the pocket it pulled the shorts right down. I caught them just in time before the heighborhood saw my panties!
So cute, airy, and flattering. Wore the same day I received bc when I tried them on I didn’t want to take them off! Considering more pairs.

I loveee these shorts. They are so cute and are perfect for summer. However, as a thick thigh girl the "inner" shorts roll up and become slightly uncomfortable, but... no one can see! Overall I like these alot, and wear them alot. * I just wouldn't wear them on long walks*
Very buttery type of fabric it's not grippable in the thigh region for girls like me with thick thighs. Not the best for a run but for just chilling or doing an  upper body workout day it's good.

These flowy shorts are extremely comfortable. They're a light, stretchy fabric that doesn't feel too hot. The shorts underneath with a pocket are amazing. I am 5'2", nearly 200 lbs and carry my weight in my stomach - usually size 18 in pants and the XL fits PERFECTLY. The waistband doesn't dig at all. Will be buying in more colors!
The waist is high and the short underneath is the right tightness to hold tennis balls.  Love the fit and the feel...very soft and light.
I should have sized up for them as running shorts but as daily walking/comfy shorts they are great!

评论概述: Baby Blue Color is NOT Light Blue
评论详情: I purchased the shirts for my daughter. She likes the way they fit. The color was supposed to be Baby Blue but looks gray in person. Will update review with more or less stars depending on fit, durability, and comfort.  Update: The seller offered me a full refund since the color was misleading. I increased my review to 4 stars.

评论概述: Shorts are super cute! But the fabric isn’t sturdy.
评论详情: These shorts are cute and flowy, do ride up (as expected to be honest, and the fabric is soft and stretchy. Unfortunately after two washes there’s a hole in my shorts that I’ll have to try to repair :/
These do not look great on myself. Kinda looked sloppy. I returned them. Material quality was good though.

评论概述: So soft! I could literally wear them every day
评论详情: It is so soft and incredibly comfortable. If I could wear them every day I would. It is a great length unlike other shorts I have bought in the past. Very cute. I think it’s perfect for a warming day not so much colder months if you get cold easily. Great product for a good price!

These are so soft and flowy, but still give me enough coverage for full-on workouts. They are extremely flattering, giving me shape where I have little (I am 5’8”, 140lbs, athletic/straight build and these make me look like I have hips and an (albeit small) but. I can typically wear a small in shorts but prefer a medium to give me a little more mobility. I went with a medium in these, and while they fit, I’d probably order a small if I were to order them again. The legs are so wide that you can get away with that, and the spandex underneath are a tiny bit loose. Overall I’d say TTS but if you’re in-between, size down. I have run, played tennis, and done HIIT workouts in these and have had no issues with any.

I absolutely love the shorts! When they were on sale, I bought them in five colors. My only complaint is I got the same size and all of them and they all fit differently. For example, I wore a pair yesterday and they were perfect and now I wore some today and they’re a little tight. Luckily the band is chargeable so it’s fine but it’s something that should be noted, either way I’m glad with my five new pairs of shorts and I will be my summer wear.

评论概述: Comfortable Dupe - But they ride up
评论详情: I did use the sizing chart because I wanted a dupe of the aerie crossover shorts.  These are cute, but if you are very active, they WILL ride up during the course of your day.

评论概述: i feel like i’m wearing nothing
评论详情: these shorts are so comfortable!! i’m typically a 16-18, XL-XXL and i got an XL in these shorts. they are crazy stretchy, the shorts underneath are comfortable (once i broke the seams) and the pocket on the side is nice they don’t stretch out throughout the day (at disney or at a music festival) i’m 5’4” and about 230lbs for reference honestly, get the shorts

only leaving 4/5 because the material is SO SOFT that the shorts ride up on me. overall these are very comfortable for lounging in and not necessarily doing anything too rigorous with sweat and chub rub

I float down the river a couple of times a year and I got these to give me more coverage than my suit bottoms.  They work great! They have lots of stretch, shorts underneath and dry faster than my swim bottoms. Bonus that I can run into the store if I need to.

评论概述: Cute and comfortable but shorts aren’t the best
评论详情: Very cute and comfortable for the price- but the shorts under CONSTANTLY ride up my thighs whether I’m sitting or standing and it’s annoying. If not for this I would give it 5 stars. I’m recovering from abdominal surgery and my belly is swollen so it’s perfect to hide that and still enjoy the hot weather. If the shorts didn’t ride up I would definitely 5/5 stars highly recommend.

Okay, these are really cute. I wanted something that looked like a skirt but offered the comfort of shorts (my boyfriend thought it was a skirt when he saw me in them). I’m 6 months pregnant so the cross waist was what I was looking for and I got a size larger than I normally would. They came pretty wrinkled out of the package, but after a wash, the wrinkles are all out. They’re a little on the short side, but I still feel comfortable wearing them out and I’m happy I got them! Maybe it’s my pregnant body, but the way they fall on my hips makes me feel a little frumpy and the inside shorts tend to roll up my thighs. Overall, though, I’m glad I have them and I will be buying more when I’m not longer pregnant!

I wanted to love this skort but I do like it. First off, it’s very comfortable and breathable but the waist band doesn’t stay put. I wore them on my walk and I was constantly fixing the waist band and pulling the shorts down. That’s my main issue. I got a size (L) and I’m typically a medium in Amazon leggings. I hope the ones that come with the longer shorts work better for me.
Both of my girls cannot get enough of these cute shorts and have them in a variety of colors. Super comfortable, flattering, and adorable!!! True to size

I’m usually a size 8 and ordered a large. Pleasantly surprised with how comfortable they are and I love the way the waistband fits.  Buttery soft material, although they are more “shiny” versus matte in color. If you’re curvy I would size up because the shorts underneath are a little more snug.
Good quality. I work outside so it gives flexibility and comfortability. Unfortunately, the crotch ripped a few wears in. Had to reorder it.

These shorts are soo comfortable! The material feels like butter. I usually wear a small in shorts and that's what i ordered in these. They fit perfectly. I thought they might be short on me but they weren't at all. They covered me completely. I'm very comfortable in them and I don't have to continually be pulling them down because even if they do crawl up on me a little bit, they still aren't too short. I got them in white and when they first came in, I was sure they were gonna be see-through but they actually aren't at all. The only small complaint I have is that they do get caught on things eaisily. Like, a lot of the time my fingernails will catch on to them and i don't have long fingernails. These isn't a big deal other than my fingernails will pull at the fabric and mess up the shorts a little. Other than that, I love these!
I love these! They’re so comfortable and flattering. I’ll definitely buy more!

These shorts are soooo soft and buttery which I love. The crossover waist is very cute and flattering especially doesn’t feel restrictive. I don’t usually like shorts w/ a spandex lining and these aren’t great, they ride up quite a bit so aren’t very great for running. Overall they’re not too bad for price paid but wouldn’t buy more

If you're on the fence about sending these shorts back, be sure you wash them first. Out of the packaging they fit so weird and had bad creases, but after washing, they look much more like the picture. The material reminds me a lot of a swimsuit so they dry really quickly!
Love these shorts! Stretchy, comfy, quality is all great! Plus has a hidden pocket!!

I really do love these shorts. They are a beautiful color and oh so so soft. I do have a little pooch and sometimes the band rolls down and needs to be readjusted, but they are super comfortable. I would buy again and in other colors.

评论概述: EXCELLENT! So comfortable and luxurious feeling!
评论详情: Super cute and flattering fit. I'm 5'5", 145 lbs., athletic build. I bought a medium. The waist band is super soft and there is no elastic at the top to bind and cut into your skin. They fit and feel just like my Athleta tights. Amazing! I stocking up on these so I never run out. So many colors to choose from too! Great price for amazing product!
This is more like swimwear material, and it fit more like a small rather than a medium.
These shorts are very comfortable and adorable! very flattering! My favorite is the inside pocket under the skirt for your phone!
These are beautiful. They seem very high quality. I’m pleased with them. They were exactly as advertised. I’m 5’ 7”, 133. I got a medium. They fit me great.

As a plus size person I cannot stress enough when people don’t post any pictures of how it looks on you I weight 243 and I am 5”8 tall I wear XL but decided to size up best decision ever! It has one pocket on your right leg it has shorts and it’s very stretchy I have always problems finding shorts because of my booty and my thick legs but as you can see it fit perfectly and it does not feel tight at all and it covers well my inner thighs where I feel most uncomfortable. I do recommend ! And will be buying another pair !
the fit is tts, but the thinness of the material makes it fold down at the waist. still cute and worth the price. just wish there was a little better waist band to keep it from folding.
Favorite shorts. They’re soft and snug but not uncomfortable
Truly comfortable shorts I wore these on a trip to Hawaii. Comfortable for walking, outdoor hiking, golfing. I also liked the pocket within the shorts as well. For sure going to buy in other colors.

I tried the arie ones on and love them but they were too short in the back for my body type so I decided to wait and look on Amazon, I order these that same night and got them the next day super fast. They fit great and are really flattering. They are soft like the arie ones but give you more structure and the length is perfecttt. I saw a few reviews that said they roll and up and I have thicker thighs and haven’t had an issue with that yet. 10/10 will buy more!!
I get a lot of compliments when I wear these, but my o my complaint is the spandex shorts underneath tend to ride up/ roll up the thighs

They are very comfortable…. Once I fixed the under lining shorts. They are so tight I had to rip the seems out. The front material does bunch up a lot between your legs but the material is great and they are light and cool.
Loved these shorts. I’m newly postpartum with my first child, and these have been great for my changing postpartum body. They look flattering and are both comfortable and forgiving
I love the flow of the shorts. The material is very comfortable. Only thing I don't think the phone pocket is strong enough to hold my phone without making the shorts fall down.

These shorts are amazing! They look attractive and even for a girl with big thighs they fit nicely. They ride up a little if I’m walked a long way, but overall they stay in place. They are super super soft and feel great on my legs. They’re attractive and look great while wearing. They have a phone pocket on the leg and I really enjoy that for wearing all day. I am 5’5 160lbs and the medium fits great.
It fits a little snug even though I ordered a size up but will be fine.

I am 5'6" and 145 lbs with an athletic build (wider thighs/legs) and these shorts are my go-to shorts for walking, running, working out, or playing sports. The fabric is lightweight and breathable and not see through at all. The top layer has plenty of movement to keep your legs cool while the under layer provides support and keeps the shorts from sliding around. There is a pocket on the spandex layer which is super helpful, and the shorts move as you move. The white was very clean and bright, and I got them in pink too and the color is exactly like the picture. The crossover waistband does give a very flattering shape and help to add shape to your waist. Wonderful shorts that I'll be wearing all summer!

I loved the idea of these and they are very comfortable! I just dislike that they actually do look like a tennis shirt and was too girlie for my day to day. Would be cute for a teen though! I’m returning.

I love the whole idea of shorts that give the illusion of a skirt. These do not do that. I am a little round, but my legs are average (no thigh-gap). Following the size chart these things pulled and bunched and were just all around very unflattering. I did appreciate the fabric. It was soft and cool but still thick enough it isn't showing every detail of your anatomy. The waistband hit at a comfortable spot and the length of the shorts were good. I probably wouldn't recommend these to anyone.

Great shorts, I love wearing them on a hot day out and about to theme parks, shopping, or even a night out! The flare is great, true to size, stretchy, has a pocket for your phone, and just flattering! I bought in two colors and will get more!
I like these shorts!
It's cute comfortable. Pocket fit my oneplus 11 phone. I wish the material is less shiny. It's that swim suit shuny material

These shorts are very similar to another pair I got from a popular brand. The popular brand sold them to me for $40, but I found them on Amazon for much cheaper. I wasn't sure if they would be similar at all, but I'm happy to say that these are even better than the original! The quality is much softer, so I ended up buying them in two different colors. I did get a stain on the white flared shorts, but it surprisingly came off!

I am not a fan of tight fitting shorts, I always find them too short or dig into my stomach. I was hoping these would be perfect and sure enough they were! Buttery soft (not exaggerating) and insanely comfortable. I’m sorta in-between a small and a medium, and I usually size up for comfort. I’m so happy I got the medium in these! Highly recommend!

I love these shorts they are perfect for working out, running errands or the casual dress day. They are comfortable and super soft. I like the way the high waist sits and I can wear crop tops with minimal skin showing. It has a pocket in the shorts. Liked so much I own 2 colors!
Super cute but didn't look right for what I was looking for! Super comfy
Great material, good for working out, shorts fold a little bit is not uncomfortable. Side pocket hold enough and it's good for working out.

评论概述: Great for everyday wear, not for working out
评论详情: These are comfortable, but these are not sweat proof. Good as athleisure and maybe a darker color would be better if you’re planning on wearing them to work out.

评论概述: Wish I could wear these every day
评论详情: These are my favorite shorts I’ve ever owned. My best friend had a pair and I immediately ordered the light blue ones. They are so incredible soft and comfortable and flattering. I have no notes. I love the fit and the waist line and these are definitely better than the aerie ones that I am assuming they are a dupe for. Absolutely obsessed and have already shared the link with so many friends.

Love these shorts I’m marathon training and they are very comfortable for my long runs I high recommend them. I also find them more modest than some of my other shorts which I like. I have four pairs now that is how much I love these shorts. I’m 5ft 3in 115 lbs wearing a small if that helps :)

Got an xxl with plenty of room and the black is flattering. Got black and brown, brown is not something I’d wear in front of other people without a really modest shirt bc it shows all of my imperfections but I will be wearing the black. They are soft as other reviews mentioned BUT they’re athletic fabric so if you’re not into that, be warned. I could see them being hot- haven’t worn them outside. Also the pocket is at the bottom of the shorts, which is fine I just wasn’t expecting it. Overall would buy black over and over.
I wore these to Disney world and they were so comfortable! I could of probably went down a size Im (135 1bs/5”4) but I highly recommend!

I literally never write reviews but these are so good I couldn’t resist. I was absolutely floored by the quality. They feel like lululemon or aerie leggings with how soft they are and are also the perfect length! I’m 3 months postpartum and weigh 145lbs and ordered a medium and they are so comfy and flattering! They hold you in nicely but aren’t too compressive. I’m already looking to see which color to buy next!
These shorts are so soft and comfortable! The sizing fits super comfortably true to size.
